data.strFullDescription:
[b]The full product, [i]Waltz of the Wizard[/i] contains hours of content, receives frequent free updates, showcases the latest in VR technologies such as hand-tracking, voice interaction, full-body gestures and the most interactive character you can find in VR, Skully:
[h2][url]https://store.steampowered.com/app/1094390/Waltz_of_the_Wizard_Extended_Edition/[/url][/h2]
data.strSnippet: Store page for the legacy demo of Waltz of the Wizard created as a prototype to showcase the power of room-scale VR. Please find the full product in the description below.
